title: Amazing View! Corner Unit, and Pet Friendly! Call for SPECIAL!
map_address: 300 Channing Way near Professional Center Pkwy
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Located in San Rafael, View at Marin includes sensible studio, one, and two bedroom apartment homes.
View at Marin apartments offer a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and in-unit washer/dryers.
Community amenities include a fitness center, a sparkling pool and a relaxing hot tub.
We are now offering in person tours!
Self guided and virtual tours are still available.
Our entire leasing process from viewing available homes, executing your lease, to moving in, will all be done safely and in adherence to all social distancing guidelines.
Our leasing team is available to support your needs in our office, via phone, email and video during normal business hours.
We look forward to meeting you and helping you find your new home!
